PercentileBsdCareFeeAgreement.name: PercentileBsdCareFeeAgreement
PercentileBsdCareFeeAgreement.description: Specifies the payment terms for contracts of Percentile Based Care Fee Agreement.

BracketInformation.description: The description of the percentile bracket information.

ContractPaymentAgreementId.description: The contract payment agreement record to which this percentile based care fee agreement is associated.

FifthBracketPrice.description: The price for the procedure if the member falls into the fifth percentile bracket based on the factor considered by the payer.

FirstBracketPrice.description: The price for the procedure if the member falls into the first percentile bracket based on the factor considered by the payer.

FourthBracketPrice.description: The price for the procedure if the member falls into the fourth percentile bracket based on the factor considered by the payer.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced the record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed the record.

Name.description: The name of the percentile based care fee agreement.

ProcedureCodeDescription.description: The description of the procedure code.

ProcedureCodeId.description: The industry standard code for the procedure such as CPT or HCPCS.

RelativeValueUnit.description: The relative value unit for the procedure.

SecondBracketPrice.description: The price for the procedure if the member falls into the second percentile bracket based on the factor considered by the payer.

StandardPrice.description: The standard price for the procedure defined by the governing body.

ThirdBracketPrice.description: The price for the procedure if the member falls into the third percentile bracket based on the factor considered by the payer.
